text: Does anyone know if it's possible to communicate directly with the chat API, without using the SDK? Is there any API documentation for it?
It's not possible to interact directly with the Live Chat API, but you can register your own custom channel. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels>
That's unfortunate. As much as having an official SDK is nice, it would be even nicer if developers had the option of building their own implementations as well

I'll pass this feedback on to the team. Out of curiosity what types of changes would you make if you could implement the chat yourself? Are there specific features you believe we're missing, customization items you'd like to see etc?
